channel.title: Idiots
channel.description:
So, I was just wondering. Have you ever really encountered a idiot while on the streets? I have.
I was once lost while looking for a hotel to meet my friends, so I started asking people where the hotel was. The first woman didn't have a clue how to speak english, the second guy didn't live local so he didn't know the place very well, and the third was a local idiot.
The local idiot give me directions, but the directions he gave me would have landed me in scotland. Left, right, right, left, straight up, first turn right, then down a path, then go north east for half a mile ect. I knew the place I needed to go wasn't that far from where I was standing at the time, but I couldn't seem to get there.
In the end it turned out that it was just up the road :S

item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

krackkid:

I was sitting in my house and heard what I was thinking was a drug deal, the person was saying"Give me the coke and I will give you 30$", so I looked out side to see, it was just coke a cola-.-(fail)

Haha holy shit bro. I bet. Have you tried pepsi though? That really gets you phucked up.
